channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amid Russian Sabotage, U.K. Points Finger at Putin Over Novichok Death
item.description: The 2018 death of a British woman from exposure to a rare, military-grade nerve agent was the result of a botched assassination attempt on a former Ru...

item.title: Inside RFK Jr.’s Methodical Quest to Shake Up America’s Vaccine System
item.description: The health secretary has walled himself off from government scientists and empowered fellow activists to pursue his vaccine agenda.

item.title: U.S. reconsiders Tanzania ties after deadly post-election crackdown
item.description: The U.S. is "comprehensively reviewing" its relationship with Tanzania after hundreds were killed in a violent post-election crackdown.

item.title: DOJ orders prison inspectors to stop considering LGBTQ safety standards

item.title: How old is your music taste? Spotify will tell you, though you may not like it
item.description: Spotify Wrapped is bluntly telling users their "listening age," which in many cases is several decades older or younger than their actual age. It's a ...

item.title: CDC advisers delay planned vote on hepatitis B vaccine for infants

item.title: Libraries and museums get federal funding back after Trump cuts

item.title: Eurovision Is in Turmoil as Israel’s Participation Leads to Boycott
item.description: The Netherlands and Slovenia also said they would not take part in next year’s contest, meant to be its celebratory 70th edition.

item.title: When Kids Adopt New Technologies, Hype Can Turn to Backlash
item.description: The arc of mobile phones and social media may foretell the future of artificial intelligence in schools.

item.title: Dominik Duka, Czech Cardinal Jailed Under Communism, Dies at 82
item.description: While in prison in 1981, he befriended the dissident and future Czech president Vaclav Havel. Later, he became a conservative voice in Rome.
